pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gavv (2024, TV show)$(br2)Used to access Gavv's $(l:gavv/riders/gavv#punchingummy)Punchingummy Assist$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Gavv's $(l:gavv/riders/gavv#kickingummy_punchingummy)Kickingummy&Punchingummy Assist$(/l)
Obtained by eating $(l:misc/items/gummi_candy)Gummi Candy$(/l) with a $(l:gavv/items/blank_gochizo)Blank Gochizo$(/l) in your inventory
